mapper.sql: id, empId, ordinalId, scoring, examineTime, remark
mapper.select:
select te.id,te.empId,te.ordinalId+tex.standard as ordinal,te.scoring,te.examineTime,remark from tb_examine te,tb_examineStandard tex where te.ordinalId = tex.ordinal
and te.empId = #{idcard}

select te.id,te.empId,te.ordinalId+tex.standard as ordinal,te.scoring,te.examineTime,te.remark,em.name as name, em.cyzg_card as cyzgCard from tb_examine te,tb_examineStandard tex,tb_employee em where te.ordinalId = tex.ordinal and te.empId=em.idcard
and em.cyzg_card like '%'+ #{cyzgCard}+'%'
and em.name LIKE '%'+ #{name}+'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_examine (empId, ordinalId, scoring, examineTime, remark) VALUES(#{empId},#{ordinalId}, #{scoring}, #{examineTime}, #{remark} )
